title: Fix YAML null-safety in Python BDD test helpers
description: Verify and fix missing null-safety after yaml.safe_load() in python/features/steps/shared.py and python/features/steps/initialization_steps.py to match production behavior (safe_load(...) or {}).
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Verified bug in both test helper files and fixed null-safety by changing yaml.safe_load(...) to yaml.safe_load(...) or {} in shared.py and initialization_steps.py to match production behavior. Ran quick sanity test: python -m pytest python/tests/test_placeholder.py (pass).

custom.beads_acceptance_criteria: Both step helper loaders use yaml.safe_load(...) or {} and no longer raise TypeError on empty YAML input.
